name: High Tappin' Flyers
description:
Fly high to collect coins and batteries in this action packed flying adventure! With beautiful cartoon graphics, fast tappin' gameplay, and plenty to unlock and upgrade will keep you playing for hours! It's not just about how fast your fingers can tap the screen, though. Each flyer has its own tappin' speed, weight, and glide ability.
Let your eyes be the guide and your fingers be the glide in High Tappin' Flyers!

Meet the flyers:
~Mecha Chicken
~The Bullet
~Hawk
~Plane
~Flying Pig
~Flying Saucer
~Penguin...with a jetpack!

Features:
~One finger tappin' gameplay! ~7 flyers to use in fast paced flying action!
~15 upgrades for each flyer!
~Un-lockable paint jobs for all flyers!
~7 procedural generated levels to gather coins, so your experience is never the same!
~Beautifully colorful graphics to brought to life!
~Last but not least...You!
